Method for forward pass.

  • x1 – input tensor to be upsampled
  • x2 – input tensor to be summed

neural.blocks.layers.conv3x3(in_channels, out_channels, padding=1, stride=1)¶

Method for convolution with 3x3 kernel.

Parameters:
  • in_channels – input number of channels
  • out_channels – resulting number of channels
  • padding – number of pixels to pad tensor
  • stride – stride of convolutional kernel
Return y:

output tensor
neural.blocks.layers.conv5x5(in_channels, out_channels, padding=2, stride=1)¶

Method for convolution with 5x5 kernel.

Parameters:
  • in_channels – input number of channels
  • out_channels – resulting number of channels
  • padding – number of pixels to pad tensor
  • stride – stride of convolutional kernel
Return y:

output tensor

Method for convolution with 7x7 kernel.

Parameters:
  • in_channels – input number of channels
  • out_channels – resulting number of channels
  • padding – number of pixels to pad tensor
  • stride – stride of convolutional kernel

output tensor

Utils¶

utility.utils.create_folder(folder, force=False, raise_except_if_exists=True)¶

Method for creating folder.

Parameters:
  • folder – path to folder to be created
  • force – if True, overwrite directory to be created in case of existence
  • raise_except_if_exists – if True, raise exception in case of directory existence
Raises:

Exception – exception is raised if trying to create folder which exists
utility.utils.delete_contents_folder(folder)¶

Method for deleting all contents of folder.

Parameters:f – path to folder to be deleted with all contents
utility.utils.delete_file_folder(f)¶

Method for deleting file or folder.

Parameters:f – path to folder to be deleted
Raises:Exception – exception is raised if failed to delete
utility.generate_toy_dataset.check_positive_int(value)¶

Method for checking value to be positive integer.

Parameters:value – input value
Raises:TypeError – exception is raised if value is not positive
Return ivalue:resulting value
utility.generate_toy_dataset.parse_args()¶

Method for parsing args.
